What's Cookin' Good Lookin'

This is a web application created by Turing School of Software Development Mod 2 students! In this project, we created a recipe tracking / meal planning application that allows users to view recipes they want to cook and plan shopping trips around them. Users should be able to view a list of recipes and choose recipes to cook! Enjoy!
